thread.title: Watch live: Loveland at Fort Collins football
thread.title_full: Watch live: Loveland at Fort Collins football

title: Watch live: Loveland at Fort Collins football
text:
Watch live: Loveland at Fort Collins football Coloradoan 5:58 p.m. MDT October 1, 2015 Fort Collins High School football fans flash the light from their phones towards the Fossil Ridge bleachers during a game at French Field Friday, September 11, 2015. (Photo: Austin Humphreys/The Coloradoan) 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Fort Collins High School football team is looking to get back in the win column Thursday night. 
The Lambkins (1-3) host Loveland (2-2) in a nonconference game at French Field Thursday night. It's the final nonconference game for each team. 
Fans who can't make it to French Field for the 6:15 p.m. kickoff can watch the game live right here on Coloradoan.com thanks to our friends at Stream It Sports . Watch live high school football games happening in Fort Collins every Thursday and Friday on Coloradoan.com. Also follow reporter Kevin Lytle for live updates from the game.
